enGB: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Free_Actions}free action{/g}, you may create a bond between yourself and your eidolon. Whenever damage would kill your eidolon, you may take the damage instead.

At 2nd level, a summoner can share the senses of his eidolon, hearing, seeing, smelling, tasting, and touching everything the eidolon does./nThe summoner's perception score is equal to their eidolon's, if they eidolon has a higher perception score.
